# The `DwarfTransformer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class that transforms the DWARF in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcontext">DWARFContext</a> into GSYM information by populating the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator">GsymCreator</a> object that it is constructed with. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A class that transforms the DWARF in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcontext">DWARFContext</a> into GSYM information by populating the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator">GsymCreator</a> object that it is constructed with.

This class supports converting all DW&#95;TAG&#95;subprogram DIEs into <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo">gsym::FunctionInfo</a> objects that includes line table information and inline function information. Creating a separate class to transform this data allows this class to be unit tested.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-h">DwarfTransformer.h</a>.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="D">The DWARF to use when converting to GSYM.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="G">The GSYM creator to populate with the function information from the debug info.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="LDCS">Flag to indicate whether we should load the call site information from DWARF <code>DW&#95;TAG&#95;call&#95;site</code> entries</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

## Public Member Functions

### convert() {#ab014307b03ade42770de6ed2f827630b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error DwarfTransformer::convert (uint32&#95;t NumThreads, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/outputaggregator">OutputAggregator</a> &amp; OS)</>}>
Extract the DWARF from the supplied object file and convert it into the Gsym format in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator">GsymCreator</a> object that is passed in.

Returns an error if something fatal is encountered.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="NumThreads">The number of threads that the conversion process can use.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="OS">The stream to log warnings and non fatal issues to. If NULL then don&#39;t log.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
An error indicating any fatal issues that happen when parsing the DWARF, or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success()</a> if all goes well.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-h">DwarfTransformer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-cpp/#l00618">618</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-cpp">DwarfTransformer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### handleDie() {#ac5d43ff9554a810dc5a639325f75b6bc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DwarfTransformer::handleDie (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/outputaggregator">OutputAggregator</a> &amp; Strm, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/cuinfo">CUInfo</a> &amp; CUI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> Die)</>}>
Handle any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> (debug info entry) from the DWARF.

This function will find all DW&#95;TAG&#95;subprogram DIEs that convert them into GSYM FuntionInfo objects and add them to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator">GsymCreator</a> supplied during construction. The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> and all its children will be recursively parsed with calls to this function.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Strm">The thread specific log stream for any non fatal errors and warnings. Once a thread has finished parsing an entire compile unit, all information in this temporary stream will be forwarded to the member variable log. This keeps logging thread safe. If the value is NULL, then don&#39;t log.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CUI">The compile unit specific information that contains the DWARF line table, cached file list, and other compile unit specific information.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Die">The DWARF debug info entry to parse.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-h/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-h">DwarfTransformer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-cpp/#l00444">444</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/dwarftransformer-cpp">DwarfTransformer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</ParametersList>
